aboutTexts: üíª I am a skilled and dedicated Software Engineer with a strong background in web development, backend systems, and software architecture. This versatility enables me to seamlessly adapt to various roles, performing effectively as a full-stack developer.

üë®üèª‚Äçüè´ I thrive in collaborative environments, fostering synergies to enhance both my performance and that of the team. Having worked primarily in English throughout my career, I am equally proficient in communicating with colleagues in both English and Spanish.

üìà I am committed to clean coding practices, design patterns, refactoring principles, and continuous integration/deployment methodologies. Additionally, I am an advocate of Agile methodologies and hold Scrum certifications.

experiences.description: Full stack development of a web application for real-time home sensor management and monitoring.
Full stack development of a web application for the creation and management of dynamic forms to control incidents in companies.
Research support staff in R&D&i project. Design and evaluation of multi-objective optimization algorithms.

Hired on behalf of TMConnected to develop its MCO product, a management and monitoring system for maintenance machinery fleets in the railway sector. I supported our international agile team as a developer, creating new product modules and features. Later, I transitioned to the role of Scrum Master, where I facilitated training, improved team communication, and introduced innovations in technical and value delivery practices. With a strong focus on rapid delivery, I implemented pair programming, feature flags, and flow metrics. Additionally, I coached team members on best practices and architectural principles.

As a member of the Innovation and Product department, I contributed to transforming a prototype into a fully functional, CI/CD-supported, production-deployed web and mobile application for technical assistance services. My role encompassed both full-stack development and product management. Subsequently, I played a key role in developing the backend for billing software integrated with public administration systems, utilizing Hexagonal architecture and automated testing.

education.course: Bachellors Bilingual Degree in Computer Science
education.description: Mention in Software Engineering. 4 distinctions with honours.
Multidisciplinary training and management skills. 5 distinctions with honours.
Part-time researcher at the Intelligent Systems and Data Mining Laboratory.

projects.title: El Bombas
projects.description: Multiplayer web game based on the classic Bomberman. The game includes a character store and an economy system with coins that can be earned by playing games. Each character has unique attributes. Play games and fight for the N¬∫1 position in the global Scoreboard.

projects.title: PictoTrainer
projects.description: Web and mobile application for the training and rehabilitation of people with functional diversity, presented to the HackForAlbacity2020 competition in collaboration with the CRMF-IMSERSO.

projects.title: X-Wing VR
projects.description: Virtual Reality mobile game in which you can drive an X-Wing starfighter and engage Empire's enemies. Implemented in Unreal Engine 4 for Google Cardboard.

projects.title: World in Miniature
projects.description: Virtual Reality interface technique that lets the user interact with a hand-held miniature copy of the virtual environment. Implemented in Unreal Engine 4 using HTC VIVE.

projects.title: PuerTICas
projects.description: Access control application to a smart building using facial recognition authorization. Cloud architecture based on AWS services under the IaaC paradigm.

projects.title: ProjectION
projects.description: Web application focused on giving the Product Owner and the software development team the tools to successfully manage software projects using an agile methodology. The project was developed for the Bachellors and Masters Thesis, and for the PhD Thesis.

projects.title: Journal Paper AutoChecker
projects.description: Track the status of your research papers by scraping them daily, and notifies you via email/Telegram when there are updates.

projects.title: Development Analyzer
projects.description: Simple tool to analyze the flow of development of a project, providing you valuable insights on the pace of your team, the cycle time of your tasks, as well as simulations on how would the team perform in the future.

projects.title: Unfollower Finder
projects.description: Unfollower Finder allows you to see which Instagram profiles that you follow dont follow you back, and vice versa. The app does not require any user account information, and provides a simple guide on how to find your unfollowers, without asking, sending or storing any user information.

achievements.title: 3rd Prize in HackForAlbacity2020 for the best technological solution to help people with functional diversity in collaboration with the CRMF-IMSERSO.
Certified as Professional Scrum Master I (PSM-I) by Scrum.org.
Extraordinary award for the best academic record of the Master's Degree in Computer Science, with an average mark of 9.80.
Charles Babbage Award for the best Masters Thesis in the Master's Degree in Computer Science.
SISTEDES - NTT Data Award for the best Masters Thesis on new methodologies and tools for software development.
Certified as Professional Scrum Master II (PSM-II) by Scrum.org.
Presenter at ISBSG 2023 IT Confidence Conference.
Certified as Professional Scrum Product Owner I (PSPO-I) by Scrum.org.
Certified as AWS Solutions Architect ‚Äì Associate.
Successfully Completed the PhD in Advanced Computing Technologies.
